column4: Hi! I am having a problem with my mouse, after installing ubuntu 8.04 it works for a while and then it stops! I unplug it and plug it to another laptop, and it works, I plug it back to the first laptop and still doesn't move until I restart the computer! How can I solve this?
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
